design.name: Simplex
design.description: Simplex is a HTML5-based theme introduced with CMSMS 1.11. The purpose of that theme is to demonstrate what and how can be done with CMSMS templates using HTML5 and responsive CSS for a better mobile experience. All Smarty templates used by the Simplex theme are prefixed with "Simplex". Be careful when renaming or deleting those templates. The theme uses jQuery. Theme-specific javascript is in a minified file. If you wish to change some of that javascript, refer to /uploads/simplex/js/functions.js file and replace functions.min.js file.
